params._buffer0: max amount of token0 to send
params._buffer1: max amount of token1 to send

checkLiquidatable(uint256).notice: Returns the flag whether a vault can be liquidated or not.

getPrice().notice: Gets current price of underlying token by margin token.

getTWAP().notice: Gets Time Weighted Average Price of underlying token by margin token.

getVaultStatus(uint256).notice: Returns collateral value and debt value.

liquidate(uint256,(uint8,bool,uint128,in.notice: Anyone can liquidates the vault if its required collateral value is positive.
